knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r libraries, include = FALSE}
## Import libraries
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(skimr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r import}
## import .csv from MNSDWIS
water <- read_csv("water.csv")
cols(
  pwsId = col_character(),
  mean = col_double(),
  max = col_double()
  )
```
```{r drop_column}
# drop the empty column created with the extra comma in the data
water <- water %>% select(-X12)
```
